S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-5912; testIsValidImplemented fails for NetworkServer in some slow running machines/configurations This commits the following changes: partial backport of revision 1381731 from trunk: - changes the timeout in ConnectionMethodsTest from isValid(1) to isValid(200) and adds a comment - updates the comment in ConnectionTest so it refers to ConnectionMethodsTest DERBY-2855; Convert jdbc4/TestConnectionMethods.java to JUnit backport of revision 1381429 from trunk: removing orphaned master file
